wordpressPage.title: The Â£5 Challenge
wordpressPage.content:
This challenge involves splitting your group into teams and giving them each a fiver and a list of criteria for what they can do with the fiver.

This could include things like:

Find the strangest object you can

Buy something you can wear

Buy something that will feed more than 2 people

Find the cheapest thing you possibly can (receipt needed)

It works best if you add things yourself that fits your town/village/city!
